mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select jspuser.* from jspuser order by userId) a) where rnum between #{page}*#{pageSize}-(#{pageSize}-1) and #{page}*#{pageSize}
mapper.insert: insert into jspuser (userId, name, pass, addr1, addr2, zipcd, email, tel, birth, profile) values(#{userId}, #{name}, #{pass}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{zipcd}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{birth}, #{profile, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update jspuser set name = #{name}, pass = #{pass}, addr1 = #{addr1}, addr2 = #{addr2}, zipcd = #{zipcd}, email = #{email}, tel = #{tel}, birth = #{birth}, profile = #{profile} where userId = #{userId}
